name: BrigPlan
description:
First tap to start the game. You must divide the area to all figures to complete a level. So that there is no free space. To fill a place you must click on a figure and then on a tile. The area of a human must be a rectangle around the human. Within the area of the insects must not be a 2x2 rectangle.  An area of a sphinx must not connect to another sphinx area.sphinxes. The figure with the question mark can be any figure.

The In-Game Text is only German currently, but there isn't much to read.
